question: It is a High-Performance Computer (HPC) System. It aims to improve weather forecasts at the block level, predict extreme weather events, offer high resolution seasonal and monsoon forecast in India. It has been established at the National Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecasting (NCMRWF), Noida. The name of the HPC System is _?
explanation: The High-Performance Computer (HPC) System named “Mihir”, meaning the Sun which has been established at the National Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecasting (NCMRWF), NOIDA. It aims to improve weather forecasts at the block level, predict extreme weather events, offer high resolution seasonal and monsoon forecast in India. It would also help in the prediction of cyclones with more accuracy and lead time.
